channel.title: Blog on Yao's World
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Yao's World

item.title: Kyoto
item.description: 五天的京都之行已经结束，时间不长但不觉得匆匆而过，鸭川的安详历历在目……

item.title: イルカポリス海豚刑警
item.description: 突然发现，年纪越大，越体会到音乐的力量。下班回家听音乐看 MV 已经成了固定的放松方式。 这个世界上有太多的宝藏音乐人和乐队等着我发现。 迷恋イルカポ

item.title: Her Shop
item.description: She cannot pass the afternoon without coffee. What would the coffee shop look like. If she had one? A good front look. More space on the roof! Hygiene is priority. Neon glows in the dark. Top-notch gears. Little Tangerine awaits.

item.title: Drawing of March 5, 2020
item.description: Where did I get the inspiration? I can’t remember…

item.title: Six Things Mentally Strong People Do
item.description: 今天中午听《忽左忽右》请经济学家洪灏谈SVB的破产，遂去看他的Twitter，发现下面的quote，存下来。 1 They move on. They don’t waste time feeling sorry for themselves. 2 They embrace change.

item.title: Reading Notes - Amusing Ourselves to Death
item.description: 03/11/2023 100% Reading this book was quick and painless, just like blood drawing at a medical examination. You did it, not knowing what the result would be, if it’s important at all. Almost a quarter of the book was abducted by the author’s uncanny interest in religious activities in the television era. Another quarter did remind me of the screen-centric age we’re living, though the screens now come in significantly

item.title: 25+27吋屏幕给了我什么
item.description: 英语中侧重描述电脑屏幕大小时会用「screen real estate」，屏幕如资产，越大的屏幕提供越多的可用空间。 下图是我的「屏幕资产」，由一块竖置

item.title: Reading Notes - Principles 2
item.description: 02/25/2023 62% Received the paperback Chinese version yesterday. I find it necessary to have a hard copy at hand to refer to from time to time, censored or not. I noticed myself tending to skip the charts in the book. Maybe it’s because even though I know in general what each chart is about, I failed to grasp the specifics, which makes it hard for me to fully understand the

item.title: 琵琶行
item.description: 背景 在搭建HUGO博客的过程中，无意间发现了Elizen的博客，审美和文笔都非常好，且中文字体好看极了，通过检索字体名为「霞鹜文楷」，取名自

item.title: Writing Practice I
item.description: Task 1 Prompt The graph below shows the proportion of four different materials that were recycled from 1982 to 2010 in a particular country. Summarize the information by selecting and reporting the main features, and make comparisons where relevant. Write at least 150 words. Answer Throughout the decades, recycling rates for all the listed materials have been increasing in this country. To the citizens, this should be a good thing. However, there are some additional points worth noting.
